data.title: About the University of the State of New York (USNY)
data.meta_description: The Board of Regents and the Commissioner of Education The Board of Regents sets overall education policy for the State of New York and heads The University of the State of New York (USNY). While USNY has one main purpose - providing knowledge and skills to all - it carries this policy out in many ways. The Board of Regents includes 17 members elected by the State Legislature
